question: You have a Compute Engine application that you want to autoscale when total memory usage exceeds 80%. You have installed the Cloud Monitoring agent and configured the autoscaling policy as follows: [Imagen]: https://img.examtopics.com/professional-cloud-architect/image1.png You observe that the application does not scale under high load. You want to resolve this. What should you do?

options.text: Change the Target type to DELTA_PER_MINUTE.
Change the Metric identifier to agent.googleapis.com/memory/bytes_used.
Change the filter to metric.label.state = ‘free’ and the Target utilization to 20.
